products.name: Graduation Cap
products.description: Classic black mortarboard with 2025 tassel. One size fits most.

products.name: Graduation Gown
products.description: Lightweight black gown sized by height range. Includes zipper front.

shipping.notes: Try on at pickup if needed.

products.name: Graduation Parking Pass
products.description: One-day parking pass for graduation day. Multiple passes allowed per student.

parking_rules: Vehicles parked in handicap will be towed.
venue_rules: Formal attire recommended but not required.

faq.q: Can I buy more than one parking pass?
faq.a: Yes. Multiple parking passes are allowed per student to accommodate larger families.

faq.q: Do I have to buy the parking pass with cap and gown?
faq.a: No. Parking passes can be purchased separately.

faq.q: How do I receive the parking pass?
faq.a: A PDF with a QR code will be emailed to you. Show the QR at the entrance.

faq.q: What should I wear to the ceremony?
faq.a: Formal attire is recommended but not required. No muscle shirts and no sagging pants.
